feature.label: org.eclipse.articles.doc.feature
feature.description: The Eclipse Corner Articles packaged as a help plugin. See http://www.eclipse.org/articles/index.html for the original documents.
feature.copyright: The respective copyright holder is indicated in each article.
feature.license: The articles are licensed as CPL (http://www.eclipse.org/legal/cpl-v10.html). The Eclipse plugin itself is licensed as EPL (http://www.eclipse.org/legal/epl-v10.html).
